text: Aur woh log iss mein chillayen gay aey humaray parwerdigar! Hum ko nikal ley hum achay kaam keren gay bar-khilaf unn kaamon kay jo kiya kertay thay (Allah kahey ga) kiya hum ney tum ko itni umar na di thi kay jiss ko samjhna hota woh samjh sakta aur tumharay pass daraney wala bhi phoncha tha so maza chakho kay (aisay) zalimon ka koi madadgaar nahi
